title: [BUG] Error Rendering Text in a Loop using SKTextAlign
body:
**Description**

I get an Error Rendering Text in a loop, I have attached a zip file of the code to reproduce the error.  There are 2 parts Part 1 goes out and Renders text of 300 items and it fails to render when the Text align is set to Center.  The second part does it manually and it renders just fine.  

**Code**

Attached is the sample code.
[TestApp.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/5036608/TestApp.zip)


**Expected Behavior**

Expect rendering on Text align to not fail.

**Actual Behavior**
Strange Error message

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.80.1
- IDE:  Visual Studio
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
  - Windows Classic:  10

An unhandled exception of type 'System.NullReferenceException' occurred in Unknown Module.
Object reference not set to an instance of an object. occurred
